title: Wither's Rain
description: A practicing witch, college student Wendy Ward confronts her old foe, Elizabeth Wither, who had survived the destruction of her murderous coven, which had been terrorizing Windale for more than two hundred years, as she draws on all of her Wiccan talents to destroy the evil, once and for all, in the chilling sequel to Wither. Original.
author: John Passarella
